entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 01 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.
